title: How to Play Ultimate Spider   Man (Pc)

steps.headline: Move with W, S, A, and D.
Jump with space.
steps.description: The longer space is held, the higher you jump. Press space again while in the air to double jump!

steps.headline: Crawl on walls.
steps.description: While running into a wall, press "F" to crawl up the wall. To run walls: Jump into a wall, press 'F' and leave all the controls except 'W'.

steps.headline: Do web swing to move faster.
steps.description: Shoot a web line out by pressing the right mouse button. The longer the right mouse button is held, the longer you will hold onto your web line. Press "Q" to boost your swing. Use swing boost when you need to swing a bit faster. If you want to get some upward momentum, press/hold "E" to climb your web.

steps.headline: Develop your own combat style.
steps.description: Press "Q" to punch your enemy and "E" to kick your enemy. Switching between Q and E, performing unique combinations and switching between enemies or attacking multiple enemies at once will cause more damage. Hold down the left mouse button to perform a web attack on your enemy!

steps.headline: Press "F" to pick up civilians in danger.
Do Web zipping your enemies.
steps.description: Web zipping is great for on top of low buildings like in Queens.

steps.headline: Once again, control Venom with W, S, A, and D.
Perform a claw attack by pressing "Q" while facing an enemy.
steps.description: Also, perform a tentacle attack with "E".

steps.headline: Use Locomotion jump to move faster.
steps.description: This is Venom's mode of transportation. To do this, hold down the right mouse button. The longer you hold it down, the higher Venom will jump.While playing as Spider-Man or Venom, you can access the city map any time by pressing "B".

text: Controls (Spider-Man) Move with W, S, A, and D.  Jump with space. The longer space is held, the higher you jump. Press space again while in the air to double jump! Crawl on walls. While running into a wall, press "F" to crawl up the wall. To run walls: Jump into a wall, press 'F' and leave all the controls except 'W'. Do web swing to move faster. Shoot a web line out by pressing the right mouse button. The longer the right mouse button is held, the longer you will hold onto your web line. Press "Q" to boost your swing. Use swing boost when you need to swing a bit faster. If you want to get some upward momentum, press/hold "E" to climb your web. Develop your own combat style. Press "Q" to punch your enemy and "E" to kick your enemy. Switching between Q and E, performing unique combinations and switching between enemies or attacking multiple enemies at once will cause more damage. Hold down the left mouse button to perform a web attack on your enemy! Press "F" to pick up civilians in danger.  Do Web zipping your enemies. Web zipping is great for on top of low buildings like in Queens. Controls (Venom) Once again, control Venom with W, S, A, and D.  Press Space to jump.  Perform a claw attack by pressing "Q" while facing an enemy. Also, perform a tentacle attack with "E". Press "F" to crawl up walls.  Use Locomotion jump to move faster. This is Venom's mode of transportation. To do this, hold down the right mouse button. The longer you hold it down, the higher Venom will jump.While playing as Spider-Man or Venom, you can access the city map any time by pressing "B".
